mapper.select: SELECT A.PRDT_CD AS PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ ,A.PRDT_NM AS PRDT_NM /* 상품명 */ ,A.MNGM_BDCD AS BDCD /* 부점코드 */ ,A.ORTN_FND_CD AS ORTN_FND_CD /* 운용펀드코드 */ ,F.EXC_SN AS EXC_SN /* 실행일련번호 */ ,F.TR_SN AS TR_SN /* 거래일련번호 : 거래순번 */ ,F.SN AS SN /* 일련번호 */ ,F.RGST_SN AS RGST_SN /* 등록일련번호 */ ,C.TR_DT AS TR_DT /* 수취일자 */ ,D.INTR_CALC_STRT_DT AS INTR_CALC_STRT_DT /* 이자계산시작일자 */ ,D.INTR_CALC_END_DT AS INTR_CALC_END_DT /* 이자계산종료일자 */ ,B.EXP_DT AS EXP_DT /* 만기일자 */ ,F.INTR_CLC_DNUM AS INTR_CLC_DNUM /* 총이자일수 */ ,F.THMM_DNUM AS THMM_DNUM /* 당월일수 : 경과이자일수 */ ,F.EPRZ_CRDL_TRGT_AMT AS EPRZ_CRDL_TRGT_AMT /* 기업여신대상금액 : 선수금액 */ ,F.THMM_ACML_ERN_AMT AS THMM_ACML_ERN_AMT /* 당월누적수익금액 : 경과누적금액 */ ,(CASE WHEN (F.STTM_NO IS NULL OR F.STTM_NO = '') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS ACCT_YN /* 회계반영여부 */ ,F.RSTR_PRCS_YN AS RSTR_PRCS_YN /* 환원처리여부 */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 딜승인기본 */ ,IBIMS811B B /* 딜월별잔액 */ ,IBIMS410B C /* 딜거래내역 */ ,IBIMS406B D /* 여신이자계산내역 */ ,IBIMS401B E /* 여신기본 */ ,IBIMS820B F /* 기업여신월별결산내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = B.PRDT_CD AND B.STDR_YM = SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) /* 기준년월 */ AND B.PRDT_CD = C.PRDT_CD AND B.EXC_SN = C.EXC_SN AND C.PRDT_CD = D.PRDT_CD AND C.TR_SN = D.TR_SN AND C.EXC_SN = D.EXC_SN AND B.PRDT_CD = E.PRDT_CD AND D.PRDT_CD = F.PRDT_CD AND D.EXC_SN = F.EXC_SN AND D.TR_SN = F.TR_SN AND D.INT_CALC_SEQ = F.SN AND F.STDR_YM = SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) /* 기준년월 */ AND F.EPRZ_CRDL_STLA_DCD = '2' /* 기업여신결산구분코드 2-선수이자 */ ORDER BY B.PRDT_CD, B.EXC_SN

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS820B /* 기업여신월별결산내역 */ WHERE STDR_YM = SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) /* 기준년월 */ AND EPRZ_CRDL_STLA_DCD = '1' /* 기업여신결산구분코드 1-미수이자 */
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS820B /* 기업여신월별결산내역 */ SELECT SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) AS STDR_YM /* 기준년월 */ , A.PRDT_CD AS PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ , ((SELECT NVL(MAX(X.RGST_SN), 0) FROM IBIMS820B X /* 기업여신월별결산내역 */ WHERE X.STDR_YM = SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) AND X.PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD ) + ROWNUM) AS RGST_SN /* 등록일련번호 */ , A.MNGM_BDCD AS BDCD /* 부점코드 */ , '' AS ACCT_SYNS_CD /* 회계적용코드 */ , '' AS STTM_NO /* 전표번호 */ , '' AS CNCL_STTM_NO /* 취소전표번호 */ , '1' AS EPRZ_CRDL_STLA_DCD /* 기업여신결산구분코드 1-미수이자 */ , '' AS EPRZ_CRDL_ACCT_CRT_TP_CD /* 기업여신회계생성유형코드 */ , '' AS EPRZ_CRDL_FEE_KND_CD /* 기업여신수수료종류코드 */ , B.EXC_SN AS EXC_SN /* 실행일련번호 */ , 0 AS TR_SN /* 거래일련번호 */ , 0 AS SN /* 일련번호 */ , 0 AS INTR_CLC_DNUM /* 이자계산일수 */ , B.NRML_INTR AS EPRZ_CRDL_TRGT_AMT /* 기업여신대상금액 */ , 0 AS BFMM_ELPS_DNUM /* 전월경과일수 */ , 0 AS THMM_DNUM /* 당월일수 */ , 0 AS ELPS_DNUM /* 경과일수 */ , 0 AS BFMM_ARCV_ERN_BLCE /* 전월선수수익잔액 */ , 0 AS BFMM_ACML_ERN_AMT /* 전월누적수익금액 */ , B.NRML_INTR AS THMM_ACML_ERN_AMT /* 당월누적수익금액 */ , B.NRML_INTR AS THMM_ERN_AMT /* 당월수익금액 */ , 0 AS EPRZ_CRDL_ARCV_ERN_BLCE /* 기업여신선수수익잔액 */ , 0 AS BF_QU_ARCV_ERN_BLCE /* 이전분기선수수익잔액 */ , '미수이자' AS ACTS_CD /* 계정과목코드 */ , 'N' AS RSTR_PRCS_YN /* 환원처리여부 */ , '' AS EVL_DT /* 평가일자 */ , 'N' AS HDWT_INP_YN /* 수기입력여부 */ , 'N' AS DCSN_YN /* 확정여부 */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 딜승인기본 */ , IBIMS811B B /* 딜월별잔액 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = B.PRDT_CD AND A.PRDT_LCLS_CD = '90' /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 90-대출 */ AND B.LDG_STTS_CD = '1' /* 원장상태코드 1-정상*/ AND B.STDR_YM = SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) /* 기준년월 */ AND B.DEAL_EXC_BLCE > 0 /* 실행잔액 */ ORDER BY B.PRDT_CD, B.EXC_SN
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS820B /* 기업여신월별결산내역 */ WHERE STDR_YM = SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) /* 기준년월 */ AND EPRZ_CRDL_STLA_DCD = '2' /* 기업여신결산구분코드 2-선수이자 */
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS820B /* 기업여신월별결산내역 */ SELECT SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) AS STDR_YM /* 기준년월 */ , Y.PRDT_CD AS PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ , ((SELECT NVL(MAX(X.RGST_SN), 0) FROM IBIMS820B X /* 기업여신월별결산내역 */ WHERE X.STDR_YM = SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) AND X.PRDT_CD = Y.PRDT_CD ) + ROWNUM()) AS RGST_SN /* 등록일련번호 */ , Y.BDCD AS BDCD /* 부점코드 */ , '' AS ACCT_SYNS_CD /* 회계적용코드 */ , '' AS STTM_NO /* 전표번호 */ , '' AS CNCL_STTM_NO /* 취소전표번호 */ , '2' AS EPRZ_CRDL_STLA_DCD /* 기업여신결산구분코드 2-선수이자 */ , '' AS EPRZ_CRDL_ACCT_CRT_TP_CD /* 기업여신회계생성유형코드 */ , '' AS EPRZ_CRDL_FEE_KND_CD /* 기업여신수수료종류코드 */ , Y.EXC_SN AS EXC_SN /* 실행일련번호 */ , Y.TR_SN AS TR_SN /* 거래일련번호 */ , Y.SN AS SN /* 일련번호 */ , Y.TRGT_DNUM AS INTR_CLC_DNUM /* 이자계산일수 */ , Y.NRML_INT_AMT AS EPRZ_CRDL_TRGT_AMT /* 기업여신대상금액 */ , 0 AS BFMM_ELPS_DNUM /* 전월경과일수 */ , (Y.THMN_DCNT_END_DT - Y.THMN_DCNT_STRT_DT) AS THMM_DNUM /* 당월일수 */ , 0 AS ELPS_DNUM /* 경과일수 */ , 0 AS BFMM_ARCV_ERN_BLCE /* 전월선수수익잔액 */ , 0 AS BFMM_ACML_ERN_AMT /* 전월누적수익금액 */ , Y.DNUM_AMT * (Y.THMN_DCNT_END_DT - Y.THMN_DCNT_STRT_DT) /* 일별일수 * 당월일수 */ AS THMM_ACML_ERN_AMT /* 당월누적수익금액 */ , Y.DNUM_AMT * (Y.THMN_DCNT_END_DT - Y.THMN_DCNT_STRT_DT) /* 일별일수 * 당월일수 */ AS THMM_ERN_AMT /* 당월수익금액 */ , 0 AS EPRZ_CRDL_ARCV_ERN_BLCE /* 기업여신선수수익잔액 */ , 0 AS BF_QU_ARCV_ERN_BLCE /* 이전분기선수수익잔액 */ , '선수이자' AS ACTS_CD /* 계정과목코드 */ , 'N' AS RSTR_PRCS_YN /* 환원처리여부 */ , '' AS EVL_DT /* 평가일자 */ , 'N' AS HDWT_INP_YN /* 수기입력여부 */ , 'N' AS DCSN_YN /* 확정여부 */ FROM ( SELECT A.PRDT_CD AS PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ , A.MNGM_BDCD AS BDCD /* 부점코드 */ , B.EXC_SN AS EXC_SN /* 실행일련번호 */ , C.TR_SN AS TR_SN /* 거래일련번호 */ , D.INT_CALC_SEQ AS SN /* 이자계산순번 */ , D.NRML_INT_AMT AS NRML_INT_AMT /* 기업여신대상금액 : 이자금액 */ , D.TRGT_DNUM AS TRGT_DNUM /* 대상일수 */ , D.INTR_CALC_STRT_DT AS INTR_CALC_STRT_DT /* 이자계산시작일자 */ , D.INTR_CALC_END_DT AS INTR_CALC_END_DT /* 이자계산종료일자 */ , (D.NRML_INT_AMT / D.TRGT_DNUM /* 이자금액 / 대상일수 */ ) AS DNUM_AMT /* 일별금액 */ , (CASE WHEN E.TRRC_DT > F.MN_TFDY THEN E.TRRC_DT /* 이수관일자 */ WHEN D.INTR_CALC_STRT_DT > F.MN_TFDY THEN D.INTR_CALC_STRT_DT ELSE F.MN_TFDY END) AS THMN_DCNT_STRT_DT /* 당월일수시작일자(이수관일자 또는 월초일) */ , (CASE WHEN (NVL(E.CCLC_DT, '20000101') BETWEEN F.MN_TFDY AND F.MN_LSTD) THEN D.INTR_CALC_END_DT /* 해지일자 */ WHEN D.INTR_CALC_END_DT < F.MN_LSTD THEN D.INTR_CALC_END_DT ELSE F.MN_LSTD END) AS THMN_DCNT_END_DT /* 당월일수종료일자(재무인식종료일자 또는 월말일) */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 딜승인기본 */ , IBIMS401B E /* 여신기본 */ , IBIMS811B B /* 딜월별잔액 */ , IBIMS410B C /* 딜거래내역 */ , IBIMS406B D /* 여신이자계산내역 */ , (SELECT SUBSTR(#{stdrDt}, 1, 6) || '01' AS MN_TFDY /* 월초일 */ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{stdrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD')), 'YYYYMMDD') AS MN_LSTD /* 월말일 */ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{stdrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD'), -1)), 'YYYYMMDD') AS BFMN_LSTD /* 전월말일 */ FROM DUAL ) F WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = E.PRDT_CD AND A.PRDT_CD = B.PRDT_CD AND A.PRDT_LCLS_CD = '90' /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 90-대출 */ AND A.INTR_BNAO_DCD = '1' /* 이자선후취구분코드 1-선취 */ AND B.LDG_STTS_CD = '1' /* 원장상태코드 1-정상*/ AND B.STDR_YM = SUBSTR(#{stdrDt},1,6) /* 기준년월 */ AND B.PRDT_CD = C.PRDT_CD AND B.EXC_SN = C.EXC_SN AND (C.TR_STAT_CD = '1' /* 거래상태코드 1-정상 */ OR NVL(E.CCLC_DT, '20000101') BETWEEN F.MN_TFDY AND F.MN_LSTD) /* 해지일자가 해당월인 대상 */ AND C.ETPR_CRDT_GRNT_TR_KIND_CD IN ('10','20') /* 거래종류코드 : 실행,상환 */ AND C.TR_INT_AMT > 0 /* 거래이자금액 */ AND C.PRDT_CD = D.PRDT_CD AND C.TR_SN = D.TR_SN AND C.EXC_SN = D.EXC_SN AND ((D.INTR_CALC_STRT_DT BETWEEN F.MN_TFDY AND F.MN_LSTD) OR (D.INTR_CALC_END_DT BETWEEN F.MN_TFDY AND F.MN_LSTD) OR (F.MN_TFDY BETWEEN D.INTR_CALC_STRT_DT AND
